casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Arthur Lee HAMES. No. 337P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2005. Lisa Miles, for Arthur Lee Hames. *864Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of June 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2005."
